duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and coordinate activities associated with design document review and approval processes to ensure project accuracy and quality.
Provide technical support for design and construction processes using several software packages.
Work with significant autonomy on several projects assigned, managing time effectively to meet project deadlines.
Engage in client-facing tasks, including weekly client calls and occasional travel by airplane to visit project sites.
Ensure excellent understanding of plan/design review and document control, managing daily objectives effectively.

Coordinate and track drawing reviews with multiple stakeholders, prepare initial set up of projects using multiple software packages, and track project scope and oversee the closeout process for multiple projects.
Prepare and facilitate client meetings and progress reports and perform other miscellaneous consulting tasks as required.

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree in Construction Management, Engineering, Architecture, or equivalent experience in a related field. Minimum 3 years of experience in project planning experience.
Specific knowledge or experience using Procore and/or BlueDAG software to manage projects.
Strong written communication skills and proficiency in Microsoft Suite applications (Word, Excel, Outlook).
Ability to track multiple tasks on various timelines simultaneously while working largely autonomously to meet client needs.
Knowledge of ADA Standards and best practices, experience in consulting work of a similar nature (beneficial but not required).
